Function.Description: The hashString function converts the target object into an integer hash number.

Brief.Overview: The hashString function converts the target object into an integer hash number.
Brief.Usage: The hashString function is used to convert a String or Symbol into a non-unique integer value for storage and later retrieval in a hash table.

Argument.Name: aString
Argument.Note: The String to be converted into a hash integer

Syntax-String.Return: The String to be converted into a hash integer.

Argument.Name: aSymbol
Argument.Note: The Symbol to be converted into a hash integer
